medium: Color screenprint, lithograph, lithography ink, and graphite
title: Angel and Boy

description: Two nude figures; a boy at L and a celestial figure in a halo at R; the boy is crouched over; his body illuminated by a haze of bright color; predominant colors: blue, yellow, green, peach, pink
